value:
$nMPID_アルフォンス|Happy New Year,
$Nu.$k$pWe're expecting great things from
you this year too!

$nMPID_アルフォンス|Visiting a shrine, getting your
fortune, preparing special food...$k$pThough these customs may not be
the same as those we have in Askr,
they make for a worthy celebration.

$nMPID_シャロン|I've wanted to try on a pretty kimono
like this ever since I saw some Heroes
from Hoshido wearing them!

$nMPID_シャロン|So you write down something special
on a paper for New Year? For good
luck? Interesting!$k$pCan I draw a picture instead...?

$nMPID_シャロン|Commander Anna gave me a pouch
filled with gold coins! This must be
her idea of a New Year's gift, huh?

$nMPID_シャロン|Happy New Year to you! We're
here to collect your gift for
$Nf!

$nMPID_アルフォンス|I feel rejuvenated. Let us use this
occasion to start afresh and redouble
our efforts.

$nMPID_シャロン|My talent's going to blossom BIG
this year! I just know it!

$nMPID_シャロン|Oh no... Keep on like this, and we'll
not grow any stronger than last year!

$nMPID_アルフォンス|"The whole year's plans should be
made on New Year's Day..." A
fitting Hoshidan proverb.

Happy New Year! This year, Sharena
and I welcome this new beginning on
behalf of all Askr.

$nMPID_アルフォンス|When we visited the shrine, I couldn't
help but notice how intently you were
praying, $Nu.$k$p$nMPID_シャロン|Oh? What did you wish for? As for
me... Wait. Is this one of those things
where if you say, it won't come true?$k$p$nMPID_アルフォンス|You don't need to tell us, Sharena.
I'm quite sure everyone's wishes
came through clearly...$k$pIn fact, I'm certain we all want the
same thing.$k$p$nMPID_シャロン|You're right! Let's give it our all this
year too!$k$p$nMPID_アルフォンス|Indeed. Together we will carve out a
path for Askr's future and make this
year one to remember!
たあっ
そこだ！
Both of them doing dmg sounds together
$nMPID_二人|Happy New Year!

$nMPID_二人|Our warmest wishes...for
a wonderful new year!
$nMPID_アルフォンス|Everyone, celebrate!
$nMPID_シャロン|A new year!
Alfonse!?
Too much fun...
Alfonse!
Fight your hardest!

• Ready, Sharena?
• Here we go!

• We wish you...
• A happy new year!
Laugh

• For this year, and the next...
• We want you by our side!
Yes.
Felicitations!
Hooray!
$nMPID_シャロン|Alfonse, take a look at this!

$nMPID_アルフォンス|Sharena? You seem to be in high
spirits. What's going on?

$nMPID_シャロン|Look at what I just got! It's some sort
of New Year's custom from another
world.
$nMPID_アルフォンス|Ah, yes. That is called...an "omikuji."
$nMPID_シャロン|"Omi...kuji"? What's that?

$nMPID_アルフォンス|If I recall correctly, this paper is said
to govern your fortune for the
upcoming year.
$nMPID_シャロン|But I can't read the writing...

$nMPID_アルフォンス|Let me see. Hmm. This character,
I believe, is "kyo."

$nMPID_シャロン|That has quite the sound to it. What
does it mean?

$nMPID_アルフォンス|Well, if you want to boil it down to a
good-or-bad binary... This... This is
bad.

$nMPID_シャロン|Are you kidding? My year is going to
be BAD? The whole year?

$nMPID_アルフォンス|Er... Don't worry. I've read about
this... "Kyo" means that right now is
the worst for you...$k$pBut things will only get better from
now on... Well, that's one
interpretation.

$nMPID_シャロン|Oh, I see. Well, that's not so bad.$k$p*giggle* Alfonse, you're pretty clever.
You always seem to know what to say
to wash away my fears.
$nMPID_アルフォンス|You think so?

$nMPID_シャロン|As long as I'm with you, even if I have
bad luck, things will turn out all right!
We can take on anything—together!
$nMPID_アルフォンス|Ever the optimist.
